metadata.title: CVE-2024-23444 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: It was discovered by Elastic engineering that when elasticsearch-certutilCLI tool is used with the csr option in order to create a new CertificateSigning Requests, the associated private key that is generated is stored ondisk unencrypted even if the --pass parameter is passed in the commandinvocation.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
